abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the Municipal
            Development Pilot Project is to strengthen BANMA as the
            principal source of financial and technical assistance for
            municipal development.  To this end, the project will
            finance professional services to help BANMA strengthen its
            institutional capacity.  A secondary objective is to
            strengthen the financial management of those BANMA clients
            which account for the largest portion of BANMA's
            operational performance and require increasing financial
            assistance from the Central Government.  For the group of
            municipalities selected for participating in the project,
            financing will be provided for:  (a) professional services
            to strengthen municipal financial management, including
            revenue collection, budgeting, cost control, accounting,
            debt management, and planning and execution of investment
            projects.  It will also provide; (b) credit for pilot
            investments in four municipalities; and (c) a pre-investment
            fund for feasibility studies.  Finally, the project will
            finance professional services for CONSUPLANE for
            strengthening its capacity in urban and regional planning.
